dcterms:description: The LIDC-IDRI dataset contains 2568 lung nodules from 1018 chest CT scans, with each nodule individually annotated by up to four annotators. The malignancy of each nodule is assessed using a rating scale ranging from 1 to 5, denoting an ascending malignancy.
dcterms:title: LIDC-IDRI
